nodes.text: Trusk Berinato was a male Q'Itane from Upper Etrega who was a friend of Bail Organa. He employed mining droids to work in the mines of the planet Crait. During the Galactic Civil War, Berinato lured Leia Organa, and her crew to his mine shaft, so that a SCAR trooper squadron could ambush them. He shot Han Solo in the shoulder during a duel, before being shot himself by Leia in his hand.

Trusk Berinato is a character that first appeared in the in the 2017 Marvel comic book one-shot Star Wars: The Last Jedi – The Storms of Crait 1, written by Ben Acker and Ben Blacker and penciled by Mike Mayhew.
